data.oai_dc:dc: Annotation File for the Annotated Reference Transcriptome of the Eastern Oyster

The Excel file provides the annotation information, including original source transcriptome, for each contig in the reference transcriptome. The ReadMe files describes the content of each Excel file column.
Phenotypic plasticity|RNA-seq|viability selection|osmoregulation|nucleotide diversity|linkage disequilibrium|Molecular adaptation and selection|Population structure and phylogeography
